entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
